Priest Potter: May your faith be as constant as the brilliance of Einhasad, Goddess of Light... Hello! It is a pleasure to meet you. I am Priest Potter of the temple of Einhasad. Serving the Goddess is a rewarding job that makes one feel abundant. Your life can be more worthwhile by believing in and serving her.
